lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to spread Jesus love through giving. Pay it forward. We must all take care of one another.
lender.occupational_info: I care for my two children ages 14 and 5. My husband runs a successful marine electrical business.

lender.name: Kitty
lender.occupational_info: I work with elementary students that have learning disabilities and other special needs.

lender.name: Wuanda
lender.loan_because: I am in a position now where I can be of help to someone. God has blessed me, therefore I feel obligated with pleasure to be a blessing to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: My field of work consist of assisting patients with respiratory diseases. I take care of sick lungs.

lender.name: April Jones
lender.loan_because: I have been given so many opportunities in my life. I would love to help someone else in their time of need.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am a mother with two daughters. We have been blessed with the things we need and I want to share with other mothers around the world. This is a great way to do just that.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: It is the best way to change the world-one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info:
I own my own business and work out of my house. My business is with health products.
I am a retired school teacher.

lender.name: Mary-Beth
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: filmmaker

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I know how it feels to struggle with finding the financial needs to turn your dreams and talents into a successful business. If Americans find this difficult, I can only imagine the difficulty people in third world countries have.

lender.name: Jill
lender.occupation: PR/Marketing, amongst so many other things!
lender.loan_because: I hope to help in some small or maybe huge way.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneurial.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I'm selfish -- I like feeling good by helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the in the Department of Pediatrics in a medical school. I assist in providing medical services and research efforts for children as well as teaching future physicians/health staff.

lender.name: alicia
lender.loan_because: I believe helping people achieve their goals is a great gift.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I believe very strongly in giving people a hand up instead of a hand out. I have been blessed in my live and know I can help make a difference by sharing with others. Together we can make a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach at the college level to future teachers. I am also a substitute teacher in our local school district.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I love helping others in need. It's a big part of who I am.
lender.occupational_info: I research CRM softwares, customize them and train people how to use them.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to help others to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a small business owner. I make, gift package and deliver cookies to people in my area.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I have always wanted to help someone to have a brighter future. I hope this will help even one person/family
lender.occupational_info: I manage a home day care. It's great having an imput in a small childs life.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: It feels so good to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Wm. Scott
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: I was a single mother so I recognize the extra challenges that presents. I also realize how far a little assistance can go towards getting past those hurdles that life throws in one's way.
lender.occupational_info: I have been retired since late 2005 but was employed as an assistant to a federal Member of Parliament for most of my working life.

lender.name: Finley Family
lender.loan_because: we have been blessed as a family, We decided rather than giving friends and family gifts they do not need, this is a way for many people to be Blessed.
lender.occupational_info: We own a Pressure Cleaning company. We live in Florida where mold & fungus grows. Our company cleans homes & businesses in need of this service.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a hand up, not a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I have a degree in elementary education but I am currently a stay at home mom.

lender.name: Griselda
lender.loan_because: We're all blessed in different ways and should forward those wonders to others.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company manage projects and external associates.

lender.name: Cyndi
lender.loan_because: I've received help when I've need it, and now that I am in a better place financially, I loan because I can. I want to make a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 8th grade English. Most of my students are 13 years old. I love teaching!

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: what a fantastic and creative way to make a difference. This isn't a hand out it is a hand up!
lender.occupational_info: Oil and Gas Project Accountant - I clean up MESS!!

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate in my life and wanted to give back to make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: " I have everything, yet have nothing; and although I possess nothing, still of nothing am I in want "

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: We want to help others that aren't as fortunate as we are.
lender.occupational_info: I sell computer software to companies so they can run they business more efficiently.

lender.name: Laila
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone less fortunate than me. And because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who need physical help. I cook, clean, shop, take them to appointments.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people a chance to improve their lives. I have been lucky enough to receive help when I needed it.
lender.occupational_info: I taught for 33 years in elementary school and loved my job. Now I am retired and volunteer for senior citizens group and a group, AAUW, to help educate women.

lender.name: Maria Cristina
lender.loan_because: It is in the giving that we receive...

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help someone else and everyone deserves a chance to take care of themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large California State Department and I'm a analyst working with the veteran community.

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: I can, and I would hope others would help me if I ever need it.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that the software that our company uses is working properly.

lender.name: Elmer
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Teri
lender.loan_because: I like to pay it forward

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want make a difference....small actions can add up! I grew up on a farm and target my giving towards developing farms.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: Enabling other parents to build a better life for their children enables me to be a better parent.

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: "For whom much is given, much is expected" I have been blessed !
lender.occupational_info: education and social services to help children and families.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: A few friends loaned me money to start my business when I was struggling financially as a single mother. It turned my life around. I want to pay it forward.

lender.name: Sherron
lender.loan_because:
We are so blessed here in America that it should be in us all to want to give to those that are in need.
"...When someone has been given much, much will be required in return; and when someone has been entrusted with much, even more will be required. Luke 12:48"
lender.occupational_info: My job is to help manage the projects and clients that our company is working on

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: It's a privilege to have this opportunity to lend a hand to someone who clearly deserves it. Thank you Kiva for giving me this chance to share my resources.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of horses. I clean their stalls, feed & water them, mow their fields & generally take care of their day to day needs.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Love is all there is !
lender.occupational_info: Sales.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: Heard about this on Oprah!! Just a small way to give back for the blessings in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I sell fragrance and flavor ingredients to Personal Care companies in the United States

lender.name: Ann Marie
lender.loan_because: I love to help other that are less fortunate than myself.
lender.occupational_info: Customer Service

lender.name: victoria
lender.loan_because: I believe in possibilities, a new earth of peace and prosperity for all who wish to participate.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start your own business. I would love to make a difference in someone else life!
lender.occupational_info: I help families find their dream home.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: Because it gives the Glory to God.
lender.occupational_info: I'm responsilbe for implementing quality systems and improvments.

lender.name: Zenta
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am an office manager and owner of a restaurant. I believe that if you work hard and believe you can achieve anything.

lender.name: Constance L
lender.loan_because: I need to feel small so I give to those who have less then I

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little bit of help every once in a while. Someday it may be me.
lender.occupational_info: sounds a little boring and not fun,but it is nice to be able to stay home with my girls in their first few years.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I have been focused to much on myself and what I don't have. When in reality I am truly blessed. I need to focus more on trying to help others and being thankful for what God has blessed me with.
lender.occupational_info: I am a structural engineer, wife, and mother of one. My work involves desiging bridges and retaining walls for the highways and city streets.

lender.name: JASON
lender.loan_because: I loan because my life is full of good things - family, work, and enough money to get by. My family struggled when I was younger and helping others help themselves feels like the right thing to do.

lender.name: Joseph Flores
lender.loan_because: I love helping others when im able to do so. Especially those hard working folks who just need a little help and encouragement . . .
lender.occupational_info: I play music for small and large crowds of people and get to watch them dance and enjoy themselves...

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I think It is important to help people become autonomous.
lender.occupational_info: I have varied backgrounds and lots of education. Currently I'm involved with construction and education.

lender.name: Edie
lender.loan_because: It is a great pleasure.

lender.name: Marti Snyder
lender.loan_because: I find such joy in the faces of the poeple seeking these loans, helping to fulfill their dream is a blessing.
lender.occupational_info: I do volunteer work and am building my home based business with Fortune Hi-Tech Marketing

lender.name: MSC Learning by Loaning
lender.loan_because:
Why do we loan? Someone may ask why a group of kids like us are giving money to people who are in third world countries. If you really think about it we are in the same boat. We are in trouble and have problems yet we are trying to change our lives. Everyday someone on Kiva is trying to change their life. I believe in order to move forward in life you have to change. This is just what these people are trying to do. We give loans not only to learn or to be a better person, but also to give ourselves and others a second chance. So why not give a loan?
by J.M. age 17 resident, Maurice Spear Campus
lender.occupational_info: We are Maurice Spear Campus, a small school for at risk youth, operated by the Lenawee Intermediate School District in Adrian, Michigan. Our school is using KIVA as a vehicle to learn geography,current events and philanthropy. Our students raise money, manage funds and write proposals for potential loan candidates. They then learn about the countries, cultures, and political situations of their loan recipients

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: This is an excellent way to help others, turning a small amount from many into a lot of good. It's good to help an organization which sends all the donations to the end user.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the budget and accounting department at my institution

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together

lender.name: Josue
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of computers.

lender.name: Desiree
lender.loan_because: I would like in some way to be part of the process of eliminating proverty in the world.

lender.name: Teri
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women start and maintain a business.
lender.occupational_info: I teach science to children and I teach teachers how to teach science.

lender.name: Meagan
lender.loan_because: I want to help, in any way possible, enpower women to become great at whatever task. Anyone can give $25 and there could not be a better feeling then helping someone else make a living and a difference--even on the other side of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help educate my community about our local Habitat for Humanity, who works to build affordable housing for low-income families.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate to be able to and it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I believe that the more grateful we are for what we have to share, the more we will be aware of everything rich in our lives. Although I am very grateful for the creature comforts I have, my family and friends fill my heart.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an accounting firm. I am responsible for not only working with people on their taxes, but in making them aware of what they are spending and taking in all year long. I work mostly with corporations.

lender.name: Dale
lender.loan_because: I believe it's the right thing to do. I would like to believe someone would be there to help me if I were in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school counselor, serving the needs of teenagers everyday. I work to promote their education as well as their personal growth and development.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I believe small businesses are better helped by small personal loans as opposed to large corporate donations.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Set Designer in the Movie Business

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: Life is too short to be selfish. Every little bit that can make a difference and ease someone's struggles is worth it.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference rather that just talking about it.
lender.occupational_info: I love working with animals and want to help them have an enjoyable and healthy experience getting haircuts and baths. i also volunteer at the humane society grooming rescue dogs.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I care enough to help others who are working hard, struggling to get ahead and provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a single Mom who runs a part-time Web Design business from home.
A Web design business is the design of web pages, websites and web applications using HTML, CSS, images, and other media on the internet.
Whether your needs are business or of personal nature, Andreas Web will help design your presence on the web, in your own voice. And, if you imbue your website with a unique voice, visitors will notice, remember and return.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I live in Quito, though I am a North American. Seeing so much poverty first hand in Ecuador, I wanted to do a small part to help someone who is making a go!
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home with our son and daughter.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.occupational_info: Musician and teacher

lender.name: Charmayne & Charles
lender.loan_because: I have always wanted to do more, but never felt that I had the money or means to do so. When you're not as wealthy as Bill Gates or Oprah, I felt that I wasn't really making a contributuion. But after seeing this website, I know that I can make a contribution and impact lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Esthetician. I promote skin care health. I'm licensed in waxing,(hair removal) and make up application. I love to make people look and feel good. Charles is an officer in the US Army, he is stationed at the Pentagon

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: this life is a long-term game.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies with a lot of money make a lot more money.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: This is a way to actually make an impact without being rich.
lender.occupational_info: I am a manager at a restaurant.

lender.name: Rick
lender.occupational_info: I work as an Electrical Engineer but my passions are living a Christian Life and Motorcycles.

lender.name: Bev
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Artist who works with mixed metals and glass to create my own line of jewelry.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I want to get involved in areas of the world that need a little extra help.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: It feels good. It does good. It is good.
lender.occupational_info: Teach sustainable construction practices to university students in the states & offer time & service to the Eden Campus, Africa's first green business school (www.EdenCampus.co.za),

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good to invest in someone's future.

lender.name: Olalekan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are less privileged than me. I am amazed than the little I can give can impact someone's life so much.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a government organization where I help people solve computer related problems in order that they can do their work successfully.

lender.name: elizabeth
lender.loan_because: make great strides... leave small footprints
lender.occupational_info: i buy construction services.

lender.name: Barbara&Adam
lender.loan_because: we want to help people around the world!

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I could not have made it through this life without the kindness and generosity of others.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I have been in the craft business for almost 30 years. It's given me the opportunity to be a work-at-home mom. Helping someone who 'loves' fabrics and textiles as much as I do is very heartwarming. I learned about KIVA on Oprah and thought it was a very worthwhile organization.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 'professional crafter'. I began doing craft shows selling hand made baby decor and moved onto country home accessories about 20 years ago. I opened my first website about 5 years ago.

lender.name: Edie
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed to have a wonderful and virtually carefree life, perhaps because I definitely know that only through some form of service and giving is true happiness on this planet possible.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer in prison, sharing that when we begin to know who we truly are, do we feel any kind of fulfillment.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good inside.:)

lender.name: Summer and Rob Belloni
lender.loan_because: we are fortunate enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: Summer - Teacher Rob - IT Analyst

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I love to help fellow entrepreneurs get their businesses off the ground. And to give people a hand when they need it.
lender.occupational_info: I help people maintain good health with nutritional supplements.

lender.name: Gwendolyn
lender.loan_because: I have been given so many opportunities by simply being born in this country and I would like to support the efforts of others who would like to advance their station in life.
lender.occupational_info: I educate Respiratory Therapist's for a major healthcare organization. It is rewarding work. I put together in-services and lecture on trends that affect our profession.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I believe Kiva is providing an amazing opportunity and moreover a right for men and women around the world to take control of both their lives and the well being of their families. Despite political and economic strife in many of the participating Kiva countries, goals can be achieved and dreams realized with the help of this program. People like myself can help those who also want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the wine industry in Canada. The company both owns and acts as agents for wineries around the world. My contribution involves taking these wines to market and selling them to restaurant chains across the country. This is one reason I am interested in loaning in the agriculture and farming sectors as well as retail. In our industry the land and grape growers are an integral part in the success and growth of our company. I believe that sustainable farming practices can have a multitude of benefits in developing areas. I am so thrilled to play a small part in this brilliant program.

lender.name: annie
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel great!
lender.occupational_info: to be retired does not mean to do nothing. I just don't get paid now! My time is spent primarily on family and friends.

lender.name: Tarah
lender.loan_because: I want to share my success with others who work hard and may not have the same opportunities that I have.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an oil and gas company that drills wells for natural gas.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping those who want to help themselves.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I think we are all connected in this world. I want to help someone make a better life for their children.

lender.name: Burt
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know that i have the power to improve people's lives.

lender.name: Oma
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel warm and fuzzy
lender.occupational_info: I am semi-retired from the legal profession. I spend most of my time in my herb and vegetable garden.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: We all need to do our part and set a good example for our children.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: It is an easy way to help people all over the world.

lender.name: Chi-Chi
lender.occupational_info: I perform and teach classical music.

lender.name: Jose
lender.loan_because: I don't have a single entrepreneur bone in my body. I admire people that under hardship carve an existence for themselves however and I hate to see potential wasted due to lack of support and political ineptitude and apathy.
lender.occupational_info: No tengo un gran sentido empresarial pero admiro a la gente que trabaja en situaciones dificiles y odio el gasto de energia generado por la falta de apoyo y la apatia politica o la corrupcion.

lender.name: Minh Thien
lender.loan_because: i need some money for invest in the babe shop
lender.occupational_info: i am a worker . i earn about 5usd/day . so i need some money to invest in the babe shop to increase my income.

lender.name: Stephen and Dixie
lender.loan_because: We can and it makes us feel good helping others.
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I want to share with those less fortunate than myself
lender.occupational_info: I built a software company and sold it to Cisco, now I work on emerging technology there.

lender.name: Jayne
lender.loan_because: It feels great to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Volunteering at a charity thrift shop is the best non-paid job a person can have. It fills your heart.

lender.name: sheila
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO HELP OTHERS IN DIFFERENT PARTS OF THE WORLD, WE ARE SUCH A FORTUNATE COUNTRY WE SHOULD ALL DO WHAT WE CAN DO TO HELP OTHERS IN THE WORLD. I SAW KIVA ON OPRAH-THANK YOU OPRAH FOR SHOWING ME A WAY TO GIVE!!!!!!
lender.occupational_info: I OWN MY OWN SWIMMING POOL CLEANING, MAINTENCE, SERVICE.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I had help opening my small business...passing on the favor.

lender.name: James
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired diesel mechanic, working mostly on everything from aerial boom trucks to diesel cars

lender.name: Mayra
lender.loan_because: Nothing makes sense in this life if we can't help each other and share the blessings we've been given. It feels great to help someone else!

lender.name: inevitable.cc
lender.loan_because: I want others to be able to do well for themselves.

lender.name: Lor
lender.loan_because:
Why Not!
We are all one under the planetary umbrella, each of us a part of the whole.

lender.name: Eric & Staci
lender.loan_because: we are small business owners ourselves and we know how important it is to have others believe in your dream.
lender.occupational_info: Staci teaches English as a second language to immigrants of all language backgrounds. She also writes ESL textbooks. Eric owns and runs Irish pubs.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: it helps me to appreciate what I have and be grateful that I live where I do.

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: what a wonderful opportunity to be able to help others, see the results immediately and directly! This is the neatest thing!

lender.name: Fiona,Isak,Kath&Ole
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in this world.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I have benefitted greatly from people who have provided me with opportunities I otherwise would not have had. I am honored to do the same for others.

lender.name: Tommy & Janie
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do...
lender.occupational_info: I was a soldier in the U.S. Army for more than twenty years. I am currently retired. My wife, Janie is a Mechanical Engineer working as a code consultant for the State of North Carolina.

lender.name: David and Katie
lender.loan_because: we believe that everyone should be able to follow their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: David writes software for a company that is turning textbooks into an online format to save students money and cut down on costs. He also started and owns and operates a company that makes websites for start-up businesses, non-profit organizations and churches. Katie is in marketing communications for a large company.

lender.name: Paige
lender.loan_because: I want to support growth for small business owners around the world
lender.occupational_info: I run a small sandwich, bakery and catering company in the heart of thoroughbred horse country.

lender.name: Dave & Kathy
lender.loan_because: We've been very fortunate and all our children and grandchildren are healthy and doing well. We're very thankful!
lender.occupational_info: He spent many years as a plumbing contractor. She divided her time between public health nursing and chasing 4 children around.

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: I want to help make someone's dream a reality.

lender.name: Janet & Ron
lender.loan_because: We loan because we feel we have been blessed by God and everyone deserves a chance to make an honest living to provide for themselves or their family. We also like knowing where our money is going and who we are helping.

lender.name: Merry
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of giving a hand up. I also like seeing the people the money helps.

lender.name: MICHAEL
lender.loan_because: Everyone has a choice we can watch or we can help. I choose to help because I want to see people who we help make a difference so they can make a difference themselves. All it takes is a little of ourselves to make things happen.
lender.occupational_info: I work with lenders to help people purchase and refinance homes and commercial properties

lender.name: Harold
lender.loan_because: If we all helped a little it would make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work on highways and roads.

lender.name: Rod
lender.loan_because: I can ... Can you?

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I prefer to invest in those things that will make the change in the world I would want to make.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by these people. It makes me want to go out and start my own business to help others with small businesses in my own neighborhood.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserve help. It feels good to do something for someone.
lender.occupational_info: My work I thought was difficult at times, until I see how hard and dedicated these people are to work to make a living.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: This is just a small way to give back for all the blessings in my life. There is nothing more gratifying than to lend a helping hand to someone who needs it.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great idea. I like the idea of helping someone so directly.
lender.occupational_info: I was a law enforcement officer for 27 years, I worked in the courts.

lender.name: Desroches Family
lender.loan_because: We want to help small business owners across the world achieve success !!!
lender.occupational_info: We are a family that travels a lot, and see poverty in many countries. This is a great way to help, not only monetarily but also by giving people assistance while maintaining their pride !

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: God calls us to help those who need help. I believe Kiva gives honest and hard working people a chance to better their family's future by leveraging the monies of the world for the betterment of society as a whole.
lender.occupational_info: I teach families how to manage their finances in order to improve their quality of life.

lender.name: Abby
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great idea. It isn't a hand out, but a hand up. I'm proud to be involved in these businesses.

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: Someone once helped me start a business that supported my family for a number of years.
lender.occupational_info: I have raised 4 wonderful children and now take care of my home and my husband. I just found out that I am going to be a grandmother!!

lender.name: Rachelle
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to have been born a female in this country and have been given limitless opportunities to succeed. I feel these loans are an excellent way to help improve the lives of those less fortunate and their future generations.

lender.name: Kimberly Castillon
lender.loan_because: We appreciate the hard work and dedication that these people have in order to care for their families. Sometimes we ALL just need a little boost.

lender.name: mardi
lender.loan_because:
If I can stop one heart from breaking, I shall not live in vain; If I can ease one life the aching, Or cool one pain, Or help one fainting robin Unto his nest again, I shall not live in vain.
_______Emily Dickinson

lender.name: Isabelle
lender.loan_because: Everyone should.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in California, studying Political science with an emphasis in public administration. Someday I would like to work for the UN or another NGO that helps others around the world.

lender.name: Sandra Mullings Barrett
lender.loan_because: "Give to him who asks you, and from him who wants to borrow from you do not turn away" (Matthew 5:42). We all have a responsibility to give to those less fortunate than ourselves.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children who are between the ages of 10 to 14 years of age and have special needs. Also, have been a missionary in Kenya.

lender.name: Anderson Custom Homes
lender.loan_because: We believe in giving back to the community. Kiva is one of the best websites around to do this! As business owners, we definately understand the hardships of starting up and we want to help in our own small wayl
lender.occupational_info: We own a small, family owned construction business specializing in mountain contemporary and cedar log homes.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I want to help others less fortunate than I am.
lender.occupational_info: Generous, compassionate, wanting to help in any way possible.

lender.name: RYAN
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and feel blessed to have the life that I do. I would like to help other people's dreams come true.

lender.name: Veronica Vallez
lender.loan_because: Micro loans are a great way to help people around the world and it's an easy way to put my beliefs into action.
lender.occupational_info: Tech Recruiter

lender.name: Hector and Barrie
lender.loan_because: Is better to give than to receive

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I can and because I believe that microfinancing can have a huge impact on the lives of people and communities. I invest here in Canada and want to use some of my own wealth to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer, imagineer and facilitator. I help governments, companies and non profits realize their potential as sponsors of innovative enterprises.

lender.name: Rosalie
lender.loan_because: I loan because giving is one of the biggest things that makes me feel the happiest.
lender.occupational_info: I became a nurse because I wanted to make a difference in the world by helping the sick. What I didnt expect is that I would receive so much more in return.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed and I am called to bless others

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I'd like to lend a hand to those who are actively trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: It's very rewarding to be able to give of myself either physically or financially.

lender.name: Mary Ellen Barton
lender.loan_because: IN MEMORY OF MY DEAR ANYA MEGAHAN - I LOVE AND MISS YOU, PUMPKIN!!! I HOPE TO SEE YOU AGAIN SOMEDAY...YOU'LL ALWAYS BE MY GIRL. LOVE, YOUR ELLEN
lender.occupational_info: I write policy directives for the United States Navy.

lender.name: Tonja
lender.loan_because: I do for others what I would want done for me. "Do not wait for leaders. Do it alone, person to person." - Mother Teresa.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 15/16 year-olds how to read and write.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I respect the people of Peru and enjoyed my visit to several countries in Africa. I hope I can make a small difference in our world.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I am withdrawing my funds from Kiva ... and making future loans through other organizations because Kiva continues to promote cockfighting businesses by posting cockfighting loans on the Kiva website. ..... For over a year Kiva has been requested by many, many Kiva lenders to please add bloodsports to the list of businesses for which Kiva will not post loans, but kiva management adamantly refuses. Therefore I am withdrawing my funds and am supporting other more humane organizations

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I makes me feel good to help people!
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell their homes.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can. And it feels sooo good to give.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who need it. I can't afford to loan large amounts by myself and love being able to combine with others to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer and editor who loves to use information to educate, inform and entertain.

lender.name: Iren
lender.loan_because: There were difficult times in my life when I needed help and I was blessed to receive it. Now it's my turn to return the favor.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a chef who specializes in raw fish.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I want to give others the chance to succeed!
lender.occupational_info: I make sure computers are secure

lender.name: Leonard
lender.loan_because: I just feel that it is encumbent upon us all to make the world a better place, in whatever way we can. The good feeling one gets from helping others is undeniable.
lender.occupational_info: I am reponsible for the installation of air conditioning and heating systems in commercial buildings

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I think that it's important to support someone that wants to try something on their own and support their family, be given a hand up. I would want someone to do the same for me if I needed it!
lender.occupational_info: I work at an international trade law firm. I consult companies on import laws and do a lot of training on U.S. import laws.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I believe in the goodness of the human race.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school for half of the day to become a teacher. The rest of the day I work with 5th and 6th graders at a literacy program.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: If I can't open my own business, I want to be able to help someone else succeed with theirs!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a legal secretary in New York City in labor and employment law.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I have access to funds, while many other entrepreneurs don't.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I want to help and give something back.

lender.name: jan
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO HELP A WOMAN HAVE HER DREAM COME TRUE.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: Lift a finger, lift the world, one person at a time....

lender.name: Carol
lender.occupational_info: I work no more that 8 days per month, providing extra income for my family. I dedicate the majority of my time to caring for my 2 children and husband. I try to be a good citizen and help others when I can. I consider this an amazing opportunity to lend support to small business owners around the world.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I have beenin business for over 35 years, there is a certain pride in owning and succeding in business, I think it is wonderful that we can give others this opportunity.
lender.occupational_info:
I work with schools and non profit groups. youth groups, etc.
"Helping groups reach their goals"

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: It is wonderful to be able to give someone a chance to pursue their passion and better the life of their family.

lender.name: Ray
lender.occupation: Software Sales Consultant, Human Rights Activist
lender.loan_because: I believe poverty is one of the most important issues of our time and this is a great idea to lift people out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info:
I specialize in enterprise software, which is software used by large businesses and organizations to do their day to day operations.
I also help organize an anti-human-trafficking community group in Washington DC. For more info about the group, go to www.stopmodernslavery.org.

lender.name: Coeur
lender.loan_because: It matters to them, it matters to me! We are all one heart united.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Children's book author that inspire children into positive action by encouraging them to be Angels in Action for others.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Because, overall, it makes the world a smaller, better place to live.

lender.name: Elesa
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I love to learn about the world and be a participant in change that works.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. We can really only help the people who want to help themselves. I am happy to see people who are trying to better their situation and am more than happy to lend a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I help people save money & make money to plan for their future. Goal setting is key, most people don't plan to fail, they just fail to plan. I help people get to where they want to be.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I believe most people will succeed, if we can find a way to give them a chance.

lender.name: Linda Sanders
lender.loan_because: I can and I believe that this is the way to change the world, one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I did many things before retiring; I was a probation officer, a social worker, a loan officer and owned a restaurant.

lender.name: Deborah & Leigh
lender.loan_because: We want our grandchildren like Sonja to live in a world of help and hope.

lender.name: Jewel
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to give back and helps all of us on this planet.
lender.occupational_info: I am a leadership and life coach helping women to set and achieve their goals. I help people and organizations to develop their potential.

lender.name: ANNA
lender.loan_because: I loan because maybe one day I will need help and somebody will find me and help me. Another reason is that I want to fight poverty and maybe this little thing bring a smile to a person in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a housekeeper.I don't make a big money ,but I feel that there are always people who have less than I do who struggle every single day to survive .

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: This world needs to give "Mercy" and to recieve. I am able to do both here. Do the right thing....Pay it forward....There but for the Grace of God go I....
lender.occupational_info: Grandmother, Mom & Wife...Part time Yoga Inspiration to others and random acts of kindness woman.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I believe one person can make a difference and that 'what goes around, comes around' is true. This organization allows the average person, with average resources, to make an impact.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time mother and used to work in social services with family's separated by problems in the home. I donate to Kiva in honor of all the kids in my family!

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: as a small business person myself, I know how much time and dedication it takes to run a sucessful business. Also, it makes me feel great!
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time freelance photographer. I make most of my income from weddings, portraiture, and commercial work such as photographing boquets and cakes(yum!) for wedding magazines. I also photograph the restaurants that are reviewed for my local newspaper.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: I believe that when each of us succeeds, we all are blessed.

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: Girls are uneducated and women are marginalized in large parts of this world, and its not an accident that these countries are disproportionately mired in poverty and ripped apart by fundamentalism and chaos. Theres a growing recognition among everyone from the World Bank to the U.S. militarys Joint Chiefs of Staff to Aid Organizations that focusing on women and girls is the most effective way to fight global poverty and extremism. Foreign aid is increasingly directed to women because the world is awakening to a powerful truth: Women and girls are the solution!

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: I want to enable hard-working people to better their living conditions, letting them know others care about their plight.

lender.name: Anastasia
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help people directly. I have a small business and know what a struggle it can sometimes be.
lender.occupational_info: I like to sew. My specialty is historic clothing, but I make all kinds. I work as a volunteer to local theatre groups and sew for my children, grandchildren and friends.

lender.name: melissa
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help someone in need. I am so glad that I am fortunate enough to be able to help!
lender.occupational_info: I program computer software to support a manufacturing business

lender.name: Angie
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to give. It is a win win

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: It is time to give new starts to people
lender.occupational_info: Volunteer @ Cuyahoga Valley Art Center

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way to help people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired , and a homemaker.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: Because I want to help someone in need.

lender.name: Vicki and Chris
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: It's a way to show thanks for the opportunities I have been given because people trusted me. I took $100 from my first student loan to loan to someone else for the next year. I am so glad I found a way to help that doesn't have a religious or political backing. Go team Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I am 44 years old and just got my undergraduate degree and begun my own business. It is never too late to get an education and change your life. That first $100 for Kiva has been recycled over and over, much to my delight - one of the best investments I've ever made.

lender.name: Rhea Lynn & Ryder
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Janine
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate that I have the life that I do. I would like to try to help others in countries where the opportunites are few and far between.

lender.name: Emmy
lender.loan_because: I really want to "help those who help themselves" and this seems to be a beautiful way to accomplish that.
lender.occupational_info: Retired mother of four and now realizing a new career as someone who takes care of nature's little plants at home and protects the lives of swimmers at a local pool. I just got my Red Cross lifeguard certificate this year!

lender.name: Darrell & Kris
lender.loan_because: We lead a blessed life and want to provide others with the same opportunity to achieve their aspirations and dreams.

lender.name: thomas& maggie
lender.loan_because: Its chance to make a differance form home
lender.occupational_info: Operate a people mover Wife helps people in need

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I care about people getting a fresh start and a chance to better their lives.

lender.name: J. S. V.
lender.loan_because: Such a small sacrifice on my part can have a huge impact on the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: pastor at a small parish in the mountains of West Virginia

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: you can't get along in life without a little help.
lender.occupational_info: lucky

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: Blessings given are blessing received. Love thy neighbor.
lender.occupational_info: I do not work at this time due to health limitations.

lender.name: Lars
lender.loan_because: I love to help people grow into their own.

lender.name: Caitlin
lender.loan_because: these people work harder than most people and i can help them reach economic independence.
lender.occupational_info: read, write, think, research (not necessarily in that order)

lender.name: Wellness4theworld
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting the greater good, I believe that we need to support our community at a soul level, I believe that the more we give, the more we heal ourselves and the world.
lender.occupational_info: I practice healing arts with women in children around the world. I practice in North America and Southeast Asia (mainly Thailand) my husband and I are in the process of building an eco-healing center/birthing center in Northern Thailand.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed in so many ways that I feel it's my responsibility to give back.

lender.name: Betty & Jim
lender.loan_because: To give a little help to our friends in this world.
lender.occupational_info: That we may serve.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I like to make a difference

lender.name: Ron & Karla
lender.loan_because: As entrepreneurs ourselves, we know the challenges of starting your own business and then making it grow.
lender.occupational_info: We sell products and goods wholesale.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: It is a gift in itself to give to someone in need. My hopes and dreams are that by my small contributions I am able to positively affect another person's life thus triggering good throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I review and document business processes looking for opportunities for optimization and automation (less steps = less time = less financial output = more money saved or earned)

lender.name: Angel
lender.loan_because: Passing it on ....

lender.name: Irene & Mark
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help from time to time, if we can help someone achieve their dream it's payback for all the times someone has helped us through life.
lender.occupational_info: Irene works for a health care company and Mark is a fabricator at Glacier Bay in Union City.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for all of the support that I have received myself and want to show my gratitude by passing it on.
lender.occupational_info: I create and ship custom embroidered baby gifts all around the World.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I admire those who strive to lift themselves up and work independently.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I can't do much, but I can make it a little easier for someone else. It is even more important to me now because I have been laid off from my great paying job, and live in a place with 13% unemployment, the future looks tough for me, but not as difficult as the people who KIVA loans help.
lender.occupational_info: It only takes a minute, a small step, to do SOMETHING. This is not a hand out, this is a helping hand.

lender.name: Khalil and Fatim
lender.loan_because: My wife and I would like to make an effort to bring positive change in peoples life whenever possible.

lender.name: Hallie
lender.loan_because: I feel that I am very fortunate in my life and this little bit that I can do to help is good.
lender.occupational_info: I clean in a church 3 times a week and help an elderly women one day a week. It helps supplement the family income and allows me to see my kids off to school and be home when they get home from school.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves to be successful in their work.
lender.occupational_info: I teach ballet and Hawaiian hula dance and my husband and I rebuild old homes in Oklahoma City Oklahoma.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I just want to help those who want to help themselves and their families. How can you not?
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Dialysis Laboratory that tests the blood of over 100,000 patients with Kidney Disease. I work every day so that others can have a better tomorrow.

lender.name: elda
lender.loan_because: Its good to share.
lender.occupational_info: My work involve alot of studying and i`m doing what i got to do.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I was inspired by a recent Oprah Winfrey Show.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a full-time student at Emmaus High School.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to help the women of the world.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I just want to help. I found kiva through a friend of mine and was convinced by the idea of kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a lawyer in Dsseldorf, Germany. I'm employed at a big company. Most of the time I care for the legal cases of the company, provide legal advice to the board of directors, the emploees and external partners.

lender.name: khadija
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do

lender.name: Francesca
lender.loan_because: I have a business and it feel great. So I wanted someone else to get that same feeling.
lender.occupational_info: I love making people feel beautiful inside and out. It is the best job in the world.

lender.name: Jacquelyn
lender.loan_because: Adversity does not build character, it reveals it. I just want to help and this seems to be the best way.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I have been on disability for several months now; Kiva gives me hope for a better world...

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I had been looking for a way to have my money work for others...
lender.occupational_info: I sell new homes

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I started a small business, and I understand the need for capital.

lender.name: Phil and Kim
lender.loan_because: We want to help those in need to better themselves and therfore provide a better life for their family.
lender.occupational_info: Military/Real Estate Financing

lender.name: Chyrll
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me above all I could ever have imagined through the help of others. I now want to pass on what help I can give to someone who really needs it. This is the gift that keeps on giving, touching not only this present generation, but future generations as well.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired after many years of being an administrative assistant. Now I take care of my husband and our home. I enjoy Precept Bible Studies. As time permits, I sew clothes for babies and young children. Also I enjoy working in my little flower garden.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: The money is going to help people help themselves

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: I want to help others

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: It is an incredible opportunity to improve a stranger's life in some small way.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist and designer. I use mostly recycled materials like old record albums, recycled paper and salvaged wood. I like to find beauty in things that other people overlook.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: serving human dignity is everyone's responsibility.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: It's wonderful to feel you've made a direct contribution to helping a real person rather than just give money to some organization and never know if anyone truly benefited.

lender.name: Karri
lender.loan_because: It feels good to empower others to support themselves. I have been blessed in my life and feel that I should give back and make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a fundraising company that helps non-profit organizations raise money for their causes.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: my parents are both from Vietnam & I have seen firsthand the power of the wills of some of the world's poorest people. Many people in 3rd world countries want so badly to make their lives better & would endure any hardship that comes but have no means to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time law student and I hope to use my degrees to make a real difference in the world, especially concerning international human rights.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I believe it's important to help others advance their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help people improve their overall health.

lender.name: kristen
lender.occupation: assistant to real estate agent / substitute teach
lender.loan_because: I want to help! It's as simple as that!
lender.occupational_info: I assist a real estate agent in the buying and selling of homes. I also fill in for teachers at school when they need time off.

lender.name: Denae
lender.loan_because: together with other lenders I can help people across the world help themselves

lender.name: Jaclyn
lender.loan_because: The sales in my profession have been in a downward slump for some time now. As of recent, I've noticed that it has been starting to take an emotional toll on me. I didn't want to sit around and feel sorry for myself! I thought that maybe if I helped someone in need, it would help me to feel better about my situation. And it definitely did!
lender.occupational_info: I sell new homes in the Chicagoland area.

lender.name: Gillian
lender.loan_because: Because I can
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer who works primarily for businesses.

lender.name: Tanisha
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed for my opportunities. I want to help others.

lender.name: Antoine
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro credit
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that analyzes specific companies, how they are doing and how they could do better

lender.name: Levi & Mandy
lender.loan_because: We have been given beyond our needs and are called to give.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with so much and coming from a 3rd world country I understand the needs of the people who are trying to make a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work with sellers and buyers of homes and land, assisting them in fulfilling their real estate needs, wants and desires.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: With Kiva you can really make a difference in somebody's life!

lender.name: Mavis
lender.loan_because: it is a more personal way to contribute to the success of small entreprises in developing countries especially those managed by women.
lender.occupational_info: As an officer of the Canadian International Development Agency (CIDA) I plan and manage development projects.

lender.name: Suzon
lender.loan_because: the world is a small place and each of these people is my neighbor trying to make a bit of it better.
lender.occupational_info: instrumental in getting new medical devices approved for sale in the global marketplace after ensuring their safety and efficacy.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I write software programs.

lender.name: G,S&g
lender.loan_because: of the impact it creates in our world - spread the love -
lender.occupational_info: G - is a chef and director of food service / S - runs the community shared agricultural program and gardens for a non-profit / g - is our 17 year old son who goes to school, plays music and enjoys his life

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I believe in women and know we can do anything we set our minds to do.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: It is important to me to give service to those in need. I salute those who take the initiative to invest in their own destiny by starting a business. It is very rewarding to see people succeed. As a human being we all have the responsibility to serve, share and help others whenever we are able.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to help families buy and sell homes. It is rewarding to be able to help someone move on to their next adventure in their new home.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to have the desire to suceed but lack the funds to move forward.
lender.occupational_info: My sister and I have a small embroidery business. We embroider company logos on promotional items. We also make handmade vests, jackets etc. As well we have a contract to sew binding on window valances.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: the money is used to better somebody's life.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: everyone needs to be loved
lender.occupational_info: I am a Photographer, I take pictures of weddings, parties and people. I also sell art work.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.occupational_info: I am a secretary for a local police department.

lender.name: Alin
lender.loan_because: While not rich by any means I am very blessed.
lender.occupational_info: My occupation pretty much describes itself.

lender.name: Tera
lender.loan_because: I believe God wants us to help each other.
lender.occupational_info: I dispatch State Troopers to calls for help that come in.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: empowering women by giving them the diginity of changing their situation themselves is much more powerful a gift than pllain charity

lender.name: Emi
lender.loan_because: I receive a monthly income so I am able to lend money to people who can use it to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: To educate myself and others about the world we all live in and to try to help others who need it.

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: someone gave me a chance and now I want to give that chance to someone else! Thank you Oprah!
lender.occupational_info: I teach 6th grade English...

lender.name: Ambracia
lender.loan_because: Its my duty as an American to use my blessings to help others.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I think everybody deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I sell new homes.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.occupational_info: I teach business and computers to students 14-18 years old during the day. I play music and perform during the evening.

lender.name: CHERYL
lender.loan_because: I started my company on a shoestring and admire these people who are willing to work to make a better life for them and people they love.
lender.occupational_info: Selling and managing property that makes an income for the owners. Also write a business column for a newspaper

lender.name: dana
lender.loan_because: it is my priviledge and honor to help those who want to help themselves. everyone deserves a chance to thrive. i have worked hard and have been blessed and feel very fortunate to be in a position to lend to others.
lender.occupational_info: i make ads for major movies

lender.name: Brandy Kariuki
lender.loan_because: It is important to to reach out to someone in need and to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: My job and passion is to assist people looking for work. A good majority of the individuals that I help are low income or from third world countries. I find joy and satisfaction in helping people find independance and stability.

lender.name: Floyd & Barbara Blamires
lender.loan_because: It's a feel good thing to know that you have helped make positive difference in someone's life style for their family.
lender.occupational_info: Consumer Loans

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: everyone can use a little help.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I hope that it helps improve the quality of life for people
lender.occupational_info: Employing good people, treating them fairly and with respect all through their lives.

lender.name: Jeremiah
lender.loan_because: I enjoy many blessings and I delight in being able to help others live in a world of plenty
lender.occupational_info: I own several small businesses: web stores, home service business, Skateboard manufacturer.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: 34. "A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another. 35. By this all men will know that you are my disciples, if you love one another." John 13:34-35
lender.occupational_info: I design websites. I am retired law-enforcement and now work from my home. I also have an online gift shop.

lender.name: Felipe
lender.occupational_info: I make and fit external braces (leg, spine, arms) and artificial limbs.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: the world is a globe not an empire
lender.occupational_info: I bring together people who think differently about the same issue and help them find what they have in common

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: I have far more than I need.
lender.occupational_info: I sell homes and property... compared with most people in the world, I don't work at all.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: even a little bit goes a long way. Numerous people have helped me in my lifetime, now it is my turn to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I am a co-manager of a family owned French bakery and bistro and couldn't love my job more!

lender.name: Lauren and Family
lender.loan_because: My family and I feel very strongly about social welfare, both in the United States and abroad. It is encouraging to see so many people giving so much to people abroad. We are lucky as Americans to have so much and not even know it. It is amazing how foregoing a dinner out at a restaurant can help someone thousands of miles away fund an entire business!
lender.occupational_info: Currently in residency training at UCSD in San Diego, CA and my family and I are enjoying life in southern California.

lender.name: Gary and Jeff
lender.loan_because: It's something that my Dad and I do together to help other families.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are excited to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help inform students and parents about higher education, specifically for the university I work for, the University of St. Thomas

lender.name: Alejandra
lender.loan_because: I wanted to give my mom something that she would really like on her birthday. I also hope to learn the importance of helping others and making this world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: eating, sleeping, growing, learning and making my family very happy.

lender.name: Dolores
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone realize a dream.
lender.occupational_info: I.m retired housewife. Mother of 5 still dabbling in photography and still in demand to photograph events, church activities, family reunions etc.

lender.name: Brad & Elaine
lender.loan_because: We hope that we can help.

lender.name: Sarah Smile
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed to have been able to start and grow my business and want to help others do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist, crafter, designer and a mom. I sell my designs online and in boutiques/ home decor shops.

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: I want to help people grow and succeeed. I also loan in remembrance of my father, who passed away last year.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the National Special Needs Trust department. Our department takes care of trust accounts that have been set up for people with special needs. It is rewarding to work with those that overcome so many challenges on a daily basis. They are inspirations.

lender.name: karen
lender.loan_because: I am a single mom working to support my son. I would like to help other women do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I promote the products my company sells.

lender.name: Rob & Lynette
lender.loan_because: We want to help others get a good start in life.

lender.name: Emilia
lender.loan_because: Everyone should try to extend a helping hand when they can.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I believe it is better than regular charity, it empowers people!
lender.occupational_info: Always getting our man... :)

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: After watching a show on "Oprah" and seeing what difference this made, I also wanted to make a difference in someone life
lender.occupational_info: My work is very Interesting and challenging. To see someone being able to buy their first home is a reward in itself.
